sentences.en: Carrie realised the change of affectional atmosphere at once.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉立刻感觉到气氛的变化.

sentences.en: In the end, sexuality includes physical intimacy and affectional intimacy.
sentences.cn: 最后, 性既包括肉体上的亲密,也包含着情感上的亲密.

sentences.en: So , There is futher and actural significance of strengthening the affectional education in advanced colleges.
sentences.cn: 加强高校亲情教育有着极其深远的现实意义.

sentences.en: The bonds of marriage and family life are no longer functional, but affectional.
sentences.cn: 这时,婚姻及家庭生活的纽带不再具有实用功能, 而具有了沟通情感的作用.

sentences.en: Therefore, affectional education is very important in the period of primary English teaching.
sentences.cn: 因此, 在小学英语教学中情感教育就显的尤其重要.

words.tran_cn: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
令人感动地；令人伤心地
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）
